sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The mercenary magician serves whoever can pay her, but is not particularly loyal to her employers.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Sorcerer/Sorcerers/Mercenary Magician/Maron Blackthorne

sections.body: Though she's fond of gambling, Maron doesn't always have the best luck. When the odds turn against her, she leaves town in a hurry to avoid paying her debts, and picks jobs that get her quickly out of range of collectors, even if those jobs are dangerous.

sections.name: Maron Blackthorne
